xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 19 September 2013
xwikidoc.content: <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 05:59 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 10:39 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 14:41 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 17:37 <Jim> has joined #medsavant 17:38 <Jim^> I see a message that the build failed with my latest commit, but I don't see any errors and it builds fine on my system. 17:39 <sdumitriu1> Disk full again 17:39 <sdumitriu1> I cleaned it up a bit 17:39 <Jim^> ah ok 17:39 <Jim^> Anything I need to do on my end? 17:39 <sdumitriu1> Larger disk coming soon 17:39 <sdumitriu1> Nope 17:39 <Jim^> ok thanks 18:01 <bvancea> hmmm... does this work for any of you? http://genomesavant.com/medsavant/serve/annotation/annotation.xml 18:02 <sdumitriu1> No, because the host got upset 18:02 <sdumitriu1> GoDaddy offers unlimited* disk space for the web site 18:03 <sdumitriu1> Unless the data is big 18:03 <sdumitriu1> So unlimited = a few megabytes 18:03 <bvancea> ugh 18:03 <bvancea> not very nice of them 18:03 <sdumitriu1> If we want to store larger files, we must buy a storage server, not a website server
